item.name: Administration
Identity Domain
Secure Domain 2

body.raw:
{ "name"                             : "SecureDomain2"
, "identityProvider"                 : "FederationIdentityStore"
, "description"                      : "The Federation Identity Domains that contain all artifacts required to provide standard OAuth Services belonging to business applications deployed in Serurity Domain 2."
, "tokenSettings"                    : [
    { "tokenType"                    : "ACCESS_TOKEN"
    , "tokenExpiry"                  : 3600
    , "lifeCycleEnabled"             : false
    , "refreshTokenEnabled"          : true
    , "refreshTokenExpiry"           : 86400
    , "refreshTokenLifeCycleEnabled" : false
    }
  , { "tokenType"                    : "AUTHZ_CODE"
    , "tokenExpiry"                  : 3600
    , "lifeCycleEnabled"             : false
    , "refreshTokenEnabled"          : true
    , "refreshTokenExpiry"           : 86400
    , "refreshTokenLifeCycleEnabled" : false
    }
  , { "tokenType"                    : "SSO_LINK_TOKEN"
    , "tokenExpiry"                  : 86400
    , "lifeCycleEnabled"             : false
    , "refreshTokenEnabled"          : true
    , "refreshTokenExpiry"           : 86400
    , "refreshTokenLifeCycleEnabled" : false
    }
  ]
, "customAttrs"                      : "{\"usePKCE\":\"ALL_CLIENTS_TYPES_STRICT\",\"domainCertValidityInDays\":\"1825\",\"consentExpiryTimeInMinutes\":\"180\",\"disableClientScopeValidation\":\"false\",\"TokenExchange_DelegationEnabled\":\"true\",\"TokenExchange_ImpersonationEnabled\":\"true\",\"TokenExchange_TokenExpiryInSeconds\":\"300\",\"TokenExchange_OAMIssuers\":\"\",\"TokenExchange_EnforceMayActClaim\":\"false\",\"TokenExchange_DelegationClaimsToBeCopied\":\"sub\",\"TokenExchange_ImpersonationClaimsToBeCopied\":\"sub\"}"
, "errorPageURL"                     : "https://sso.cinnamonstar.net/p20/error"
, "consentPageURL"                   : "https://sso.cinnamonstar.net/p20/silent"
}

{ "name"           : "SecureDomain2"
}

item.description: Manage the Identity Domain that contain all artifacts required to provide standard OAuth Services belonging to business applications deployed in Serurity Domain 2.

item.name: Resource Server
Secure Domain 2
oigresource

body.raw:
{ "idDomain"                      : "SecureDomain2"
, "name"                          : "oigresource"
, "description"                   : "The Resource Server providing the claims to access Oracle Identity Governance Server."
, "resServerType"                 : "CUSTOM_RESOURCE_SERVER"
, "resourceServerNameSpacePrefix" : "oigresource."
, "audienceClaim"                 : null
, "tokenAttributes" : [
     { "attrName"   : "idp"
     , "attrValue"  : "$user.attr.o"
     , "attrType"   : "STATIC"
     }
  ,  { "attrName"   : "p20_uid"
     , "attrValue"  : "$user.attr.policeidentifiername"
     , "attrType"   : "STATIC"
     }
  ,  { "attrName"   : "given_name"
     , "attrValue"  : "$user.attr.givenname"
     , "attrType"   : "STATIC"
     }
  ,  { "attrName"   : "family_name"
     , "attrValue"  : "$user.attr.sn"
     , "attrType"   : "STATIC"
     }
  ,  { "attrName"   : "email"
     , "attrValue"  : "$user.attr.mail"
     , "attrType"   : "STATIC"
     }
  ,  { "attrName"   : "phone_number"
     , "attrValue"  : "$user.attr.telephonenumber"
     , "attrType"   : "STATIC"
     }
  ,  { "attrName"   : "department_number"
     , "attrValue"  : "$user.attr.departmentnumber"
     , "attrType"   : "STATIC"
     }
  ,  { "attrName"   : "TokenExchange_AllowedClientsForDelegation"
     , "attrValue"  : "zimp"
     , "attrType"   : "STATIC"
     }
  ,  { "attrName"   : "TokenExchange_AllowedClientsForImpersonation"
     , "attrValue"  : "zimp"
     , "attrType"   : "STATIC"
     }
  ]
, "scopes": [
     { "scopeName"  : "Main"
     , "description": "Main Scope"
    }
  ]
}

item.name: Resource Client
Secure Domain 2
byserviceclient

body.raw:
{ "idDomain"                : "SecureDomain2"
, "id"                      : "byserviceclient"
, "name"                    : "byserviceclient"
, "secret"                  : "wmkah1mdkh"
, "clientType"              : "CONFIDENTIAL_CLIENT"
, "description"             : "The client application making resource requests on behalf of the resource owner with the resource owners authorization."
, "attributes"              : [
    { "attrName"            : "sessionId"
    , "attrValue"           : "$session.id"
    , "attrType"            :  "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "preferred_username"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.uid"
    , "attrType"            :  "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "groups"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.groups"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "upn"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.policeIdentifierName"
    , "attrType"           : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "preferred_username"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.uid"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "full_name"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.cn"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "family_name"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.sn"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "given_name"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.givenName"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "email"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.mail"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  ]
, "idTokenCustomClaims"     : []
, "accessTokenCustomClaims" : []
, "userInfoCustomClaims"    : []
, "redirectURIs"            : []
, "grantTypes"              : [
    "PASSWORD"
  , "CLIENT_CREDENTIALS"
  , "JWT_BEARER"
  , "REFRESH_TOKEN"
  , "AUTHORIZATION_CODE"
  , "TOKEN_EXCHANGE"
  ]
, "scopes"                  : [
    "oigresource.main"
  ]
, "defaultScope"            : "oigresource.main"
}

, "description"             : "The client application making resource requests on behalf of the resource owner with the resource owners authorization."

    { "attrName"            : "sessionId"
    , "attrValue"           : "$session.id"
    , "attrType"            :  "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "preferred_username"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.uid"
    , "attrType"            :  "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "groups"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.groups"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "upn"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.policeIdentifierName"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "preferred_username"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.uid"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "full_name"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.cn"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "family_name"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.sn"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "given_name"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.givenName"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  , { "attrName"            : "email"
    , "attrValue"           : "$user.attr.mail"
    , "attrType"            : "DYNAMIC"
    }
  ]
, "idTokenCustomClaims"     : []
, "accessTokenCustomClaims" : []
, "userInfoCustomClaims"    : []
, "redirectURIs"            : []
, "grantTypes"              : [
    "PASSWORD"
  , "CLIENT_CREDENTIALS"
  , "JWT_BEARER"
  , "REFRESH_TOKEN"
  , "AUTHORIZATION_CODE"
  , "TOKEN_EXCHANGE"
  ]
, "scopes"                  : [
    "oigresource.main"
  ]
, "defaultScope"            : "oigresource.main"
}

item.name: Authentication
Secure Domain 2
zimp
authn

query.description: Scope requested in the Access Token. In case of REFRESH_TOKEN flows, defaulted to the values in the RefreshToken if not specified. In case JWT_BEARER flow access token requests UserInfo related scopes, supported scopes are UserInfo.me, UserInfo.email, UserInfo.profile, UserInfo.address or UserInfo.phone.

request.description: Authenticates a use via Authorization Code Grant flow.

request.description:
The Password grant is used when the application exchanges the user’s username and password for an access token.

This is exactly the thing OAuth was created to prevent in the first place, so you should never allow third-party apps to use this grant.
